pageTitle: Deus Ex: Human Revolution Was August's Best-Selling Game In U.S. - Siliconera
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {1853=Square Enix and Eidos must be very, very pleased. Deus Ex: Human Revolution got great reviews but it also sold well enough to be the best-selling game in the U.S. last month. Disney have reason to be happy, too, as they have three games in the top-ten U.S. software sales chart for August., 2291=It looks like the Nintendo 3DS price drop kicked into effect, too. Nintendo sold 235,000 3DS systems and The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time 3D jumped back into the top-ten best-sellers for August at #9., 913=By Ishaan . September 8, 2011 . 4:31pm}
textBeforeTable: Meanwhile, Just Dance 2 refuses to leave the top-ten and even had another Just Dance game accompanying it last month…   It looks like the Nintendo 3DS price drop kicked into effect, too. Nintendo sold 235,000 3DS systems and The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time 3D jumped back into the top-ten best-sellers for August at #9.   Square Enix and Eidos must be very, very pleased. Deus Ex: Human Revolution got great reviews but it also sold well enough to be the best-selling game in the U.S. last month. Disney have reason to be happy, too, as they have three games in the top-ten U.S. software sales chart for August. By Ishaan . September 8, 2011 . 4:31pm Deus Ex: Human Revolution Was August’s Best-Selling Game In U.S.   Got a Tip? USA ARTICLE Interviews Xbox 360 Xbox One
